technical.q: Do I need technical skills to create my training?
technical.a: Absolutely not! Our interface is designed to be intuitive. If you know how to use PowerPoint or Word, you'll know how to use EduPro. Our support team is always available to help you.

time.q: How long does it take to create training?
time.a: Thanks to our AI tools, you can structure a complete training in 2-3 days instead of 2-3 weeks. Our trainers create their first module on average in 4-6 hours. Note that creation time depends on the availability of your training content.

payment.a: Commissions are calculated automatically and paid at the end of the month (within 30 days) via Mobile Money, bank transfer, or any other payment method available in your country. For self-paced training: payment within 30 days after purchase. For sessions: payment at end of session or in installments as you go. You receive a detailed invoice by email.

pricing.q: Can I set my own prices?
pricing.a: Yes! You set your training prices with complete freedom. We advise you on market prices, but the final decision is yours.

refund.q: What happens if a learner requests a refund?
refund.a: We apply a 7-day refund policy. If a learner requests a refund within 7 days of purchase and hasn't exceeded usage thresholds, the refund is accepted. After 7 days, commissions are considered acquired.

existing.q: Can I use my existing training?
existing.a: Absolutely! You can import your existing content (PowerPoint, PDF, videos). Our team can even help you restructure it in digital format for a better learner experience.

promotion.a: EduPro invests in marketing to attract learners to the platform. Your training is highlighted according to its quality, learner evaluations, and your subscription level. You can also promote your training on your own channels.

mariame.name: Mariame WONE
mariame.quote: I would like to thank the team for the initiative and support. Used to webinars and in-person sessions, I discovered an entirely new format... and I come out with real skills! Thanks to the courses in video format viewed in advance, course creation was easy. An inspiring collaboration that I look forward to continuing.

auger.quote: It's a very good initiative to have a platform that meets the needs of the African continent. The more we progressed, I realized that as trainers, we have the knowledge but we didn't know how to deliver it in the digital age. I was able to acquire many skills during this bootcamp, especially course structuring. I'm starting to apply them in my training at my company level.

ibrahima.name: Ibrahima YADE
ibrahima.quote: I congratulate the entire Edupro team for their availability and follow-up during this bootcamp. I had an enriching and inspiring experience. I learned to use digital tools and AI to modernize my courses. Above all, I was able to adapt my formerly in-person training to digital format: structured modules, quizzes, certificates and learner tracking. Today, I could deploy my sessions online with a better experience for everyone.
